name: Cozy It Up
description:
This game was made for the Cozy Autumn Game Jam 2022!

   This is a puzzle game about a girl that finds a house in the woods, a spooky one, and tries to cozy it up!

   There are 9 secret items to find... try to find them all if you can! :3

Controlls:

   wasd - movement

   space - jump

   e - use (doors, light switch, candle)
